Trying different values of h as follows: 
h =  0.05 , z =  17.34038387441969 , y =  22.65961612558031
h =  0.025 , z =  17.31633226733001 , y =  22.68366773267
h =  0.0125 , z =  17.371377320674437 , y =  22.628622679325552
h =  0.00625 , z =  17.3325506366779 , y =  22.667449363322113
h =  0.003125 , z =  17.296121186230526 , y =  22.70387881376946
h =  0.0015625 , z =  17.294705916337556 , y =  22.705294083662416
So Now we can see there is not much in the values of y and z so let's consider h = 0.0015625 as optimum
